objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-GONU-MIB::hwGonuAuthChangeTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwConfigChangeIP a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-GONU-MIB::hwGonuOperType i 1 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-GONU-MIB::hwGonuPassWord s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-GONU-MIB::hwGonuLoid s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-GONU-MIB::hwGonuCheckCode s EXAMPLE

description: The serial IP of configuration changes.
If the configuration changes is trigger by the command line users, the IP address is 0.0.0.0.
If it is triggered by the SNMP user, the IP address is the SNMP user's IP address.
The Trap of configuration changes will not be sent to the SNMP user
who triggered the configuration changes.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwConfigChangeIP

description: Operation type.
Options:
1. add(1) - Add
2. modify(2) - Modify
3. delete(3) - Delete
variables.name: HUAWEI-GONU-MIB::hwGonuOperType

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: The password of the GPON ONU.
GPON password size (0..10).
XG-PON password size (0..36).
variables.name: HUAWEI-GONU-MIB::hwGonuPassWord

description: The loid value of the GPON ONU.
variables.name: HUAWEI-GONU-MIB::hwGonuLoid

description: The checkcode value of the GPON ONU.
variables.name: HUAWEI-GONU-MIB::hwGonuCheckCode
